title: Safety in offices
creator_credit: United States. Navy and Bureau of Aeronautics
brief_description: A dramatisation of some of the more common accidents that happen in offices - stumbling over open file drawers, catching fingers in drawers, tipping chairs over backwards, etc. These accidents are presented in a humorous manner but the serious consequences of carelessness are stressed.
